remarks: Lemma for orthoarguesian law 5OA. (Contributed by NM, 1-Apr-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
5oalem1.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
5oalem1.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
5oalem1.3 $e |- C e. SH $.
5oalem1.4 $e |- R e. SH $.
5oalem1 $p |- ( ( ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ v = ( x +h y ) ) /\ ( z e. C /\ ( x -h z ) e. R ) ) -> v e. ( B +H ( A i^i ( C +H R ) ) ) ) $.
